body:
The most likely culprit here is page load time. Since we recommend that you activate your SmartPixel in your global footer, your SmartPixel doesn't fire until your footer loads. If your page contains a bunch of multimedia (sounds, images, videos), it is possible that your page isn't loading fast enough for your SmartPixel to finish firing before your visitor navigates away.

We recommend that you place your SmartPixel in your global footer as a best practice, but if slow load times are an issue for you, move it to your header.
name: My segment is smaller than expected.
title: My segment is smaller than expected.
